bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Electromagnetic Characterization of Conductive Gaskets in the Frequency Range DC to 18 Ghz
IEEE Draft Guide for the Electromagnetic Characterization of Conductive Gaskets in the Frequency Range DC to 18 Ghz
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1302_D7.02, Dec 2007.pdf

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Guide provides information to assist users of gaskets in evaluating gasket measurement techniques to determine which exhibit the properties critical to the intended application, to highlight limitations and sources of error of the competing measurement techniques, and to provide a basis for comparing the techniques. Emphasis is placed on those measurement techniques which have been adopted through incorporation into standards, both commercial and military, or have been extensively used.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
